verbs.description: swiss steak for two even though [ARG1: i] [V: 'm] [ARG2: a widow] i still cook for two since i frequently have a friend or grandchild join me for lunch or dinner this is a hearty main dish that gets great flavor and color from tomatoes green pepper and onion —mildred stubbs rockingham north carolina
